remarks: Vector addition in the dual of a vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ldualvadd.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualvadd.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldualvadd.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
ldualvadd.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualvadd.p $e |- .+b = ( +g ` D ) $.
ldualvadd.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. X ) $.
ldualvadd.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ldualvadd.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. F ) $.
ldualvadd $p |- ( ph -> ( G .+b H ) = ( G oF .+ H ) ) $.
